    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Canvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Canvas displays the game maze on the screen.

      • createCanvasComponents

        private void createCanvasComponents()
        Creates canvas components.

      • refreshComponents

        void refreshComponents()
        Creates a board then renders it. NOTE: This is just a test method and not intended in final product. Renders the board stored in application on the canvas.

      • renderCanvasComponents

        private void renderCanvasComponents()
        Revalidate's components on GridBagLayout to VIEW_SIZE x VIEW_SIZE. DOES NOT REPAINT.

      • resize

        void resize()
        Recalculates cell size then resize the canvas.
